Classes in org.ndnx.ndn.impl.security.crypto used by org.ndnx.ndn.impl
ContentKeys
          ContentKeys is a container class holding a key and optional IV or counter value, plus an algorithm specifier.
NDNAggregatedSigner
          An aggregated signer takes a set of blocks and computes signatures over them such that each block can be verified individually.
 

Classes in org.ndnx.ndn.impl.security.crypto used by org.ndnx.ndn.impl.security.crypto
ContentKeys
          ContentKeys is a container class holding a key and optional IV or counter value, plus an algorithm specifier.
ContentKeys.ContentInfo
           
ContentKeys.KeyAndIV
           
EncryptedIVStaticContentKeys
          Specifies encryption algorithm, keys and if necessary IV to use for encrypting or decrypting content.
KDFContentKeys
          A subclass of EncryptedIVStaticContentKeys that uses the methods from that class to derive a per-segment key and IV from a master seed, that itself is derived from content name and publisher information (plus a text label) using the key derivation function described in KeyDerivationFunction.
MerklePath
          A representation of a path through a MerkleTree.
MerkleTree
          Implementation of a Merkle hash tree.
NDNAggregatedSigner
          An aggregated signer takes a set of blocks and computes signatures over them such that each block can be verified individually.
StaticContentKeys
          This is a very simple approach to encryption keying that uses a fixed, static encryption key and an IV "seed" that is used to prefix segment-specific IVs or counters.
 

Classes in org.ndnx.ndn.impl.security.crypto used by org.ndnx.ndn.io
ContentKeys
          ContentKeys is a container class holding a key and optional IV or counter value, plus an algorithm specifier.
NDNDigestHelper
          NDN-specific helper methods for working with digests, primarily to support Merkle trees.
